description: The maximum_unused_initial_password_lifetime parameter in SAP HANA specifies the number of days for which the initial password or any password set by a user administrator for a user is valid.

queries.name: q_password_policy_maximum_unused_initial_password_lifetime
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_PASSWORD_POLICY where PROPERTY = 'maximum_unused_initial_password_lifetime'

actions.description: The parameter maximum_unused_initial_password_lifetime is set greater than the default recommended value of 7. The parameter is used to enforce a limit on the number of days the initial password is valid. The initial password is only meant to serve a temporary purpose. Please review the parameters and enforce security measures.

references: SAP Note 3230381 - What are the different parameter options available to control password policy in HANA database?,https://me.sap.com/notes/3230381
